tool.name: PDAUG Peptide Length Distribution
tool.description: Analyze peptides length distribution of a dataset
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool calculates and plots the length distribution of peptide sequences in a peptide dataset.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** fasta file with peptide sequences.
-----
**Outputs** * Return html report file.
